name: Tide Girl: Phenomena
description:
"Everything is a mutation of a mutation of a mutation…"

Hello World

This linear visual novel consists of three chapters and takes about an hour to play.

So, you wanna something different?

There are many interesting visual designs here, which can give you a unique experience.

The origin of entanglement

The plot of this game revolves primarily around the warm school life of girls in the future. 

Watch out!

You know what I mean, right?
